==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{W|Cival}} is an {{W|Archaeological site|archaeological site}} in the {{W|Petén Basin}} region of the {{W|Maya Lowlands|southern Maya lowlands}}, which was formerly a major city of the {{W|Pre-Columbian era|Pre-Columbian}} {{W|Maya civilization}}.
